job.title: Software Engineer

of the source code is maintained and improved ltligtltligtIdentify improvements to reduce technical debt ltligtltulgtltulgtltligtConduct efficient code reviews and enforce team coding standards ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtCompetencies ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTo perform the job successfully an individual should demonstrate the following competenciesltbrgtltulgtltligtDiscipline and Perseverance  Focus and commitment to solving complex issues through to completion ltligtltligtFlexibility and Hard Work  Operate in a fastpaced iterative development environment learn and adapt to new technologies
